title: Spiced cranberry jam
ingredients: ['340g fresh cranberries', '150g caster sugar', '100g demerara sugar', '60ml water', '1 orange, zested', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/4 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 dash freshly ground black pepper']
